txt.en: 'Alas for the spread of doom in Moria. I have heard rumours about the vile fungus creeping up from the depths of Khazad-d√ªm, [placeholder]. Not even the fair stone trees are safe now.\n\n'I wonder what has woken the spores and stirred them to creep upward even to these dry halls....'
HIDING CONTENT - Lines of Power
The fungus exudes a pungent, foul odour
'The three crossings are in Nud-melek.'
Found a source of the odour
The smell is less strong
DNT
The fungus exudes a pungent, foul odour

The odour seems to be wafting from the southern area of the great tree-lined courtyard in Nud-melek.\n\nSvanr wants you to investigate the odour that occasionally sneaks up to disturb his silent homage.
Found a source of the odour
Svanr is standing on the stairs leading into the Second Hall in Nud-melek, looking out over the great stone trees.\n\nYou should return to Svanr with your findings.
The smell is less strong
The fungus exudes a pungent, foul odour
Found a source of the odour
The smell is less strong
Examine the source of the odour
Find the second source of the odour
Examine the source of the odour
Find the third source of the odour
Return to Svanr
Find the third source of the odour
Return to Svanr
Svanr has detected an odd smell during his meditation upon the Stone Trees of the Second Hall.

'I have travelled here to look upon the magnificent stone trees, but I find my meditation disturbed by hints of a strange odour. It is fleeting, but its source must be powerful in such a drafty, wide, high-ceilinged hall.\n\n'Will you find the source of the odour? I would hate to see even this stone forest tainted by the evils that have crept into Moria.'
